minesweeper.title: Minesweeper
minesweeper.summary: Python recreation of the classic Minesweeper game.
minesweeper.description: This project is a fully interactive recreation of the classic Minesweeper game, developed in Python. Designed to demonstrate expertise in Python programming, the project integrates game mechanics, logical algorithms, and user interface design.

descriptions: An ability to mark cells, allowing users to flag potential mines or tag unknown cells for later review.
An active timer tracks how long it takes to complete the game.
A bomb counter updates dynamically, showing how many bombs remain based on the number of flags placed.
Automatically clears adjacent safe cells when applicable, ensuring seamless gameplay and reducing repetitive actions.
Implemented efficient game logic for generating mines, calculating adjacent mine counts, and handling chain-revealing of safe cells.
Utilized structured data to store game states, ensuring smooth and responsive gameplay.
Leveraged Tkinter to create an interactive and visually appealing game interface.
Organized files and directories for clarity and ease of maintenance.
A successful Minesweeper game showcasing flagged markers that update the dynamic bomb counter in the top right, a clear win state, and the final time displayed in the top left.
Demonstration of a Minesweeper game with unknown markers in use, leading to a lose state after uncovering a mine.
